text: Asim Basu (; 30 November 1935 - 1 February 2017) was an Indian theatre artist and director, painter and playwright. He was known for his set design work in Ollywood movies and designing Oriya book covers and movie posters. He was awarded at the 2012 Parampara Awards. He was born in Balasore district, Odisha. Basu died from a lung infection on 1 February 2017 in Bhubaneswar, Odisha at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory tract infection Category:Indian designers Category:Infectious disease deaths in India Category:Indian painters Category:People from Odisha
